Entries.Steve: Sorry, I would like to dance but I have two left feet.$1#$b#Oh! Have you tried the jelly? It's all anyone can talk about! I helped Emily make it, we used the wild berries I collected.
Entries.Steve_spouse: I don't mind if you dance with someone else, honey. I would dance with you but I can't dance.$2#$b#*wistful sigh* Spring leaves us yet again.$2
